title: Buying guide: AI-friendly structure
content:
Buying guide: AI-friendly structure

Write a guide the AI can summarize without distortion.

Learning goal

  • Draft one buying guide outline.
  • Link 3 PDPs with reasons.

Why it matters

  • Guides are strong sources if sections are clear.
  • Reduces misread and builds trust.

Explanation

  • Hero: who, which situation.
  • Decision criteria (3–5 bullets).
  • Top picks with reasons and links.
  • Policy short + link.

Examples

  • Good: Structured, linked PDPs, short reasons.
  • Poor: Wall of text, no links.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Write a guide outline for your top category using the blocks above.
  2. Add 3 PDP links with short reasons.

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Draft a second outline for another category.

Self-check

  • Guide blocks present.
  • Top picks with reasons/links.
  • Policy block included.

Optional deepening

  • Shopify content ideas: https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid/objects/product
